Scholarship and Awards

Here are some of the scholarships and awards our students have been awarded. Click the links below to see the recent recipients of each scholarship or award.

  • Heiwa Nakajima Foundation Scholarship
  • Hiroshima Singapore Association (HSA) & Mihara International Academy of Languages (MIAL) Scholarship
  • JCCI Singapore Foundation Gold Medal
  • JCCI Singapore Foundation Scholarship
  • Mitsui Cultural Scholarship
  • Mitsui Chemicals Medal and Prize
  • NUS-Kyushu Student Exchange Scholarship
